segments.text: Peering into this scene, the kitchen feels familiar yet tense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is drying dishes, apron tied neatly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sinkâ€”it's overflowing without her knowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down to the floor in a puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone could slip on that wet surface easily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are raiding the cookie jar behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stretches high on the wobbly two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating how risky their game is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, eager for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This naughtiness might lead to tears soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window reveals a peaceful outdoor garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line the path, everything so still out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the indoor mishaps is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to warn them all.
segments.speaker: PAR
